requirements: Light up the maps of the following areas in Fontaine: Nostoi Region.
Light up the maps of the following areas in Fontaine: Sea of Bygone Eras.

description: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea
requirements: Unlock all Shrines of Depths in the Nostoi Region and the Sea of Bygone Eras in Fontaine.
Follow 6 Seelie in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras to their Seelie Courts.
Open a total of 30 treasure chests in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.
Open a total of 60 treasure chests in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.
Open a total of 120 treasure chests in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.
Complete a total of 6 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.
Complete a total of 12 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.
Complete a total of 24 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.
Play all the melodies within the Ancient Autoharmonic Music Box.
